Boise River Basin: small flakes of snow @1pm. Very light rain at some point. Precip=Snow and Rain. IB: forgot SWE tube, instead did density measurements (small 250cc cutter) to solve for SWE; HN=58cm, avg. density=175kg/m3 - (58cm x 175kg/m3)/100 = 102 mm SWE.  PD: perimeter heights with magnaprobe

No LWC insturement, snow is predominantly dry. SMP files: -661, -662,
-664.  There was a variable ice layer at 15-5cm. The ice prevented
density sampling at 10-0cm.
